definition: to be facing imminent calamity (idiom)/disaster is looming
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
difficult (to...)/problem/difficulty/difficult/not good
disaster/distress/to scold
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
suffix for nouns

sentences.english: He spoke darkly of possible future disaster .
sentences.chinese: 他悲觀地說將來可能大難臨頭。

sentences.english: Here I am talkingtummy-rot about civilization, when your Tara's in danger.
sentences.chinese: 你的德園大難臨頭，我卻還在講什麼關於文明的廢話。

sentences.english: The possibility of being made redundant has been a sword of Damocles hanging over me for several months now.
sentences.chinese: 裁員的可能性好幾個月來一直使我大難臨頭的危險。

sentences.english: I can understand why my uncle felt that trouble was coming to him here.
sentences.chinese: 我能理解伯父爲何在這兒時總是覺得要大難臨頭了。

sentences.english: Many will doubtless be thrown into panic should a disaster strike.
sentences.chinese: 如有大難臨頭，很多人會驚慌失措。

sentences.english: A sense of impending doom came upon all of us.
sentences.chinese: 我們所有人都有一種大難臨頭的感覺。

definition: without a retreat route/caught in a dead end/having burned one's bridges
to whisper to one another's ear
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
to carry out a vendetta against sb
lit. to lead away a goat while passing by (idiom)/fig. to opportunistically pocket sb's possessions and walk off
to make friends again/to renew old cordial relations
variant of 定親|定亲[ding4 qin1]
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
stupid/stubborn/pigheaded
paper wedding (first year wedding anniversary)
hiding place/hideout
the critical moment/life and death crisis
a short time/a little while
honorable even in defeat (idiom)
clan/race
to return something to its rightful owner
